title: Albert Dupuy
text:
Albert Dupuy (born February 1, 1947) is a French civil servant.
He was born in <a href="Alicante">Alicante</a>, <a href="Spain">Spain</a>.
He was prefect of the French overseas territory of <a href="St.%20Pierre%20and%20Miquelon">St. Pierre and Miquelon</a>, from January 2005 to August 2006.
From December 2008 to July 2010, he was prefect of <a href="Is%C3%A8re">Isère</a>.
